item.title: Week 1
item.description: 1-18: Course Introduction # Slides Example notes 0, 1A All logistics, no notes! Thursday: Imaging. Systems of Linear Equations and Gaussian Elimination. # Slides We use devices, such as imagers, that provide information, such as a visual representation of a system Often, these devices donâ€™t work alone – they are part of a larger system that uses a combination of both physical sensors and signal processing techniques.
